# description

**Instance Property**

A string that represents the contents of the environment values instance.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Creating and accessing values

- **init()**: Creates an environment values instance.
- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses the environment value associated with a custom key.

items.description: Accesses the environment value associated with a custom key.
